settings.title: DoorBird Settings
settings.intro-notification: DoorBirds needs to be configured to send notifications to Homey for the doorbell and motionsensor triggers. You can set these manually or just click the button below to update your DoorBird(s).
settings.relaxationdoorbell: Relaxation doorbell (time between doorbell notification from DoorBird to Homey in seconds)
settings.relaxationmotionsensor: Relaxation motionsensor (time between motionsensor notification from DoorBird to Homey in seconds)
settings.relaxationdooropen: Relaxation door opener (time between door open notification from DoorBird to Homey in seconds)
settings.intro-email: These settings are needed for sending snapshot images through email. If you wish to send emails through Gmail SMTP servers and you are using 2-step authentication you first need to create an app password in your Google Account.
settings.testing: Settings have been tested succesfully. You should have received a test email.
